headline: Nvidia & AMD sell-off, Hertz extends gains: Trending Tickers
summary: Wealth host Brad Smith and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Alexandra Canal examine some of today's trending tickers. The chipmaker sell-off continues, with Nvidia (NVDA) and Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) extending losses sparked by new chip export restrictions that add costs for the company. Hertz (HTZ) extends gains fueled by billionaire investor Bill Ackman's firm, Pershing Square Capital Management, disclosing its large stake in the rental car company. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.
